reviewText: I liked them OK. I will have to watch them again. I already forgot what the movies were about. OK.
I never had DVD that played four movies. Marc let me know that it was double sided. So I got to watch them all. Very helpful seller.

This isn't really a review. I just feel that Amazon doesn't give enough information about this DVD collection. I'm adding this so any potential buyer might to be able to make an informed purchasing decision.

The Land That Time Forgot (Video 2009) - 90 min - Action / Fantasy / Sci-Fi - Director: C. Thomas Howell - Stars: C. Thomas Howell, Timothy Bottoms and Lindsey McKeon.

Dragonquest (Video 2009) - 88 min - Fantasy - Director: Mark Atkins - Stars: Marc Singer, Brian Thompson and Jason Connery.

Allan Quatermain and the Temple of Skulls (Video 2008) - 98 min - Action / Adventure - Director: Mark Atkins - Stars: Sean Cameron Michael, Christopher Adamson and Natalie Stone.

Merlin and the War of the Dragons (Video 2008) - 92 min - Fantasy - Director: Mark Atkins - Stars: Simon Lloyd-Roberts, Joseph Stacey and Dylan Jones.
